snippet: I sometimes wonder how many well-played or well-defended deals are never published because none of the players tell a journalist.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on a deal played at the World Mind Sports Games.
lead_paragraph: I sometimes wonder how many well-played or well-defended deals are never published because none of the players tell a journalist.
